title: The Choice is yours
creator_credit: Fred S Niemann and National Woman's Christian Temperance Union
brief_description: Features Dr Andrew C. Ivy, Head of the University of Illinois Professional Schools in Chicago, and a young boy and girl questioning a chemistry teacher about alcohol. Through animation, the film shows physical effects of alcohol.
